subject: [junit] Get Acquainted with the New Advanced Features of JUnit 4
msgSnippet: I ve published an article about JUnit 4 on DevX : Get Acquainted with the New Advanced Features of JUnit 4 . This
messageBody:
I've published an article about JUnit 4 on DevX : Get Acquainted with the
New Advanced Features of JUnit 4 <http://www.devx.com/Java/Article/31983/>.
This article shows you how to migrate from JUnit 3.8 to JUnit 4 and gives
you an overview of JUnit 4 new features.
Do not hesitate to post comments on DevX site.

Antonio Goncalves
